description: An upper chamber room in Thriller Bark's mansion where Brook confronts Ryuma. The room provides a dramatic setting for their sword duel, accessed by a flight of stairs.

keyEvents.title: Brook Confronts Ryuma
keyEvents.description: Brook runs up a flight of stairs and enters this upper chamber where Ryuma is calmly waiting for him, beginning their climactic confrontation.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for one of the arc's most important duels between Brook and his shadow.

keyEvents.title: Brook's Declaration of Resolve
keyEvents.description: In this chamber, Brook declares he will never give up until he reclaims his shadow, establishing the emotional stakes of the battle.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Brook demonstrates his character growth and determination.

statusHistory.reason: Chamber is operational during the Brook vs Ryuma confrontation

description: A massive freezer structure on Thriller Bark designed to contain the giant zombie Oars. The structure proved inadequate to contain Oars once he awakened with Luffy's rebellious personality.

keyEvents.title: Oars' Feeding Session
keyEvents.description: Hordes of zombies bring massive quantities of food to Oars in the freezer as he devours everything with an insatiable appetite, threatening to deplete the island's entire food supply.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the resource demands of maintaining Oars and his Luffy-like appetite.

keyEvents.title: Oars Breaks Out of the Freezer
keyEvents.description: Oars refuses to serve Moria and uses a pseudo-Gomu Gomu no Pistol to punch through and destroy the freezer wall, escaping his confinement.
keyEvents.significance: Marks Oars becoming a free-roaming threat on Thriller Bark.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed by Oars punching through the wall

description: A ceremonial hall on Thriller Bark where Absalom prepares to conduct a wedding ceremony with the unconscious Nami. The hall is attended by zombie tailors and painting zombies who assist with the preparations.

keyEvents.title: Wedding Preparations Begin
keyEvents.description: Absalom brings the unconscious Nami to the wedding hall and orders zombie tailors to prepare her dress and begin the ceremony immediately.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the creepy subplot of Absalom's non-consensual wedding plans.

statusHistory.reason: Wedding hall is being prepared for ceremony
